anya-e1214n:6: Chanda’hānitthamo’kāraṃ-dhātvantānaṃ siyākva ci, yūnaṃ dīgho ca dhātumhā-pubbama’tthapadaṃ api.
anya-e1214n:8: Bhū sattāyaṃ paca pāke gamusappa gatimhi (ca);
anya-e1214n:12: Ku sadde kucchite ṭaṅka dhāraṇe maki maṇḍane.
anya-e1214n:16: 4. Vava, lokanavittisu cakkhavutimhi (tu) rukkha (ca) khe thirahiṃsakhaṇe niya, mo’panayiṭṭhi vatādisa muṇḍisu dikkha (’tha) kakkha-kakhā hasane tura, hiṃsanavuddhigatīsu (hi) dakkha’danamhi (tu) jakkha (ca) bhakkha (matā) ana, jāladukhesu (tu) dikkha (ca) dukkha (ca) ikkha disa’ṅka na ko’kha suse.
anya-e1214n:17: 5. [A] nikkha cumbane’(pi) sikkha vijju’pādu’ pāsānamhi rakkha guttivāraṇe (pi) uñchane (siyā’pi) bhikkha yāvaladdhya’laddhisū (pi) vakkha rosasaṃhatesu mokkha muttiyaṃ caje (pi) cikkha vācabodhanesu.
anya-e1214n:18: [Ba] nakha makha rakha naṅkhāmaṅkharakkhī’khīlaṅkhā lakha vakha ikha iṅkhā uṅkha vaṅkhū’kha gatyaṃ vakhi makhi kakhi kaṅkhe khī khaye ukkha seke khu khutadhanisu (vutto) khe(’tha) khāde supe (ca.)
anya-e1214n:21: Agī igī rigī ligī vagī gatya’tthadhātavo.
anya-e1214n:23: Silāgha katthane jaggha hasane aggha agghane;
anya-e1214n:26: Vaca byattavace yāca yācane ruca dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:27: Suca soke kuca sadde (atho) vica vivecane.
anya-e1214n:33: Paca yāte kaci-vacca dittiyaṃ maci dhāraṇe.
anya-e1214n:35: Puccha sampucchane muccha mohasmiṃ lañcha lakkhaṇe;
anya-e1214n:38: Taccho tanukiraye piñcha piñchane rāja dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:42: Bhaja saṃsevane sañja saṅge (tu) iñja kampane.
anya-e1214n:48: Majja saṃsuddhiyaṃ lajja lajjane tajja tajjane.
anya-e1214n:51: Guja-kuja dvayaṃ sadde akhyatte khajja bhakkhaṇe.
anya-e1214n:53: Bhajja pāke viji bhayacalane vīja vījane;
anya-e1214n:54: Khajī gamanavekalle jī jaye ju jave (siyā;).
anya-e1214n:56: Jhe cintāyujjha ussagge gamane aṭa-paṭa dvayaṃ;
anya-e1214n:57: Naṭa nacce raṭa paribhāsane vaṭa veṭhane.
anya-e1214n:59: Vaṭṭa āvattane vaṇṭa vaṇṭatthe kaṭa maddane;
anya-e1214n:66: Ghaṭi saṅghaṭṭane taṭṭa cchedane muṭa maddane.
anya-e1214n:68: Paṭha byattavace heṭha bādhāyaṃ veṭha veṭhane;
anya-e1214n:75: Maṇḍa vibhūsane caṇḍa caṇḍikke bhaḍi bhaṅḍane.
anya-e1214n:81: Kuḍi dāhe paḍi gate hiḍi āhiṇḍane (siyā;);
anya-e1214n:87: Vaḍḍha saṃvaḍḍhane kaḍḍha kaḍḍhaṇe bhaṇa bhāsane;
anya-e1214n:89: Soṇa vaṇṇe guṇa’bhyāse iṇa-pheṇa dvayaṃ gate,
anya-e1214n:101: Gotthu vaṃse patha-pantha gate nanda samiddhiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:113: Madi balye muda-madā santose madda maddane;
anya-e1214n:116: Vida lābhe dada dāne rudi assuvimocane;
anya-e1214n:127: Dā dave du gatīvuddhayaṃ dā dāne vida jānane,
anya-e1214n:128: Tadi ālasiye bādha bādhāyaṃ gudha kīḷane;
anya-e1214n:133: Sidhu gatimhi yudha sampahāre vidha vedhane,
anya-e1214n:136: Sidha-sādha (ca) siddhimhi dhe pāne indha dittiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:137: Māna pūjāya vana-sana sambhave ana pāṇane;
anya-e1214n:140: Gupa gopanake gupa saṃvaraṇe tapa santāpe tapa issariye,
anya-e1214n:141: Cupa mandagate tapuubbege rapa-lapa vākye sapa akkose;
anya-e1214n:144: Kapi kiñcicale kappa sāmatthe vepu kampane;
anya-e1214n:149: Capa sāntve pu pavane jhapa dāhe supo saye,
anya-e1214n:153: Amba sadde (ca) assāde tāyane sabi maṇḍane;
anya-e1214n:158: Labha lābhe jambha gattavināme subha sobhane,
anya-e1214n:159: Bhī bhaye rabha rābhasse (cā)’rambhe khubha sañcale;
anya-e1214n:162: Sumbha saṃsumbhane sambha vissāse yabha methune;
anya-e1214n:170: Damo dame nama name (atho) sama parissame,
anya-e1214n:171: Yamu uparame nāse ama yāte mu bandhane;
anya-e1214n:178: Cāya sampūjane tāya santāne pāya vuddhiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:181: Tara taraṇasmiṃ thara santharaṇe bhara bharaṇasmiṃ phara sampharaṇe,
anya-e1214n:182: Sara gati cintā hiṃsā sadde phura calanādo hara haraṇasmiṃ;
anya-e1214n:184: Ri santatismiṃ ri gate ru sadde khuracchidasmiṃ dhara dhāraṇamhi,
anya-e1214n:185: Jara jīraṇatthe marapāṇacāge khara sekanāse ghara sevanamhi;
anya-e1214n:187: Garo nigareṇa seke dara ḍāhe vidāraṇe,
anya-e1214n:191: Kura kkose nara naye jāgara supinakkhaye;
anya-e1214n:194: Khala sañcalane phulla vikāse jala dittiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:197: Dala duggatiyaṃ nīla vaṇṇe mīla nimīlane;
anya-e1214n:212: Ava rakkhaṇe jīva pāṇadhāraṇe (tu) plavo gate;
anya-e1214n:215: Davo (tu) davane devu devane sevu sevane;
anya-e1214n:219: Hve avhāne keva seke dhuva yātrā thiresu (ca;);
anya-e1214n:221: Asa gasa adane ghasa adanasmiṃ-isa pariyese isuicchāyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:224: Kusa akkose dusa appīte-tusa santose pusa posamhi,
anya-e1214n:225: Rusa ālepe rusa hiṃsāyaṃ-masu macchere usu dāhe (’pi;)
anya-e1214n:227: Hasa hasanasmiṃ ghusa saddasmiṃ-tasa ubbege trasa ubbege,
anya-e1214n:230: Gavesa maggaṇe paṃsa nāsane disa pekkhaṇe,
anya-e1214n:233: Saṃsa pasaṃsane issa issāyaṃ kassa kassane,
anya-e1214n:234: Dhaṃsa padhaṃsane siṃsa icchāyaṃ ghaṃsa ghaṃsane;
anya-e1214n:240: Kisa sāṇe kasa gate kasa hiṃsāvilekhane;
anya-e1214n:246: Su sadde su pasavane si saye (ca) si sevane;
anya-e1214n:249: Raha cāgasmiṃ muha mucchāyaṃ-maha sattāyaṃ bahu saṃkhyāne;
anya-e1214n:252: Ruha sañjanane ūha vitakke vaha pāpaṇe;
anya-e1214n:255: Nindāyaṃ garaho īha ghaṭṭane miha sevane;
anya-e1214n:258: Vhe saddamhi hasane hā cāge luḷa manthane
anya-e1214n:262: Tuda byathāyaṃ (tu) nuda kkhepaṇe likha lekhaṇe,
anya-e1214n:263: Kuca saṅkocane rica kkharaṇe khaca bandhane;
anya-e1214n:271: Puṇo subha kiraye vatta vattane cata yācane,
anya-e1214n:278: Kapa acchādane vappa vāraṇe khipa peraṇe;
anya-e1214n:280: Supo saye chupo phasse (vattate) capa sāntvane,
anya-e1214n:283: Sumbha saṃsumbhane jambha jambhane jubha nicchubhe,
anya-e1214n:284: Ṭhubha niṭṭhubhane camu adane chamu hīḷane;
anya-e1214n:286: Jhamu dāhe chamu adane irīya vattane’(pi ca),
anya-e1214n:292: Tila snehe cila vāse hila hāve silu’ñchane,
anya-e1214n:293: Bila bhede thūla caye kusacchedana pūraṇe;
anya-e1214n:296: Phula phasse musa theyye thusa appikirayāya (tu)
anya-e1214n:304: Nī pāpaṇe muna ñāṇe hana hiṃsāgatīsu (’pi)
anya-e1214n:306: Pārakkhaṇamhi pā pāne brū vācāyaṃ viyattiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:307: Bhā dittiyaṃ mā pamāṇe (atho) yā pāpuṇe (siyā;)
anya-e1214n:310: Asa (dhātu) bhuvi (khyāto) si saye sā samatthiye;
anya-e1214n:313: Hū dāne’(pi ca) ādāne havyadāne (ca vattate,)
anya-e1214n:314: Hā cāge kamu yātrāyaṃ dā dāne dhā (ca) dhāraṇe;
anya-e1214n:318: Rudhi āvaraṇe muca mocane rica recane,
anya-e1214n:319: Sica seke yuja yoge bhuja pālanabhojane;
anya-e1214n:327: Sivu tantūnasantāne khī khaye khā pakāsane;
anya-e1214n:329: Kā-gā sadde (pi) ghā gandho’pādāne ruca rocane,
anya-e1214n:330: Kaca dityaṃ muca moce (atho) vica vivecane;
anya-e1214n:332: Rañja rāge sañja saṅge khalane majja suddhiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:333: Yujo samādhimhi lujo vināse jhā vicintane;
anya-e1214n:335: Tā pālane chidi dvedhākāre mida sinehane,
anya-e1214n:338: Sida pāke padagate vida sattā vicintane,
anya-e1214n:339: Dī khaye supane dā (ca) dāne dātva’vakhaṇḍane;
anya-e1214n:342: Kudha kope sudha soce rādha hiṃsāya siddhiyaṃ;
anya-e1214n:345: Vidha vedhe gidha gedhe rudhi āvaraṇā’disu;
anya-e1214n:348: Sinā soce kupa kope tapa santāpa pīṇane;
anya-e1214n:350: Lupacchede rupa nāse pakāse dipa dittiyaṃ,
anya-e1214n:351: Dapa hāse labha lābhe lubha gedhe khubho cale;
anya-e1214n:356: Lī silese dravīkāre vā gatī bandhanesu (ca,)
anya-e1214n:363: Susa sose bhasa adhopāte nasa adassane;
anya-e1214n:364: 116. Sā’ssāde sā’vasāne (ca) sā tanūkaraṇe (pi ca) hā cāge muha vecitte naha sajjanabandhane naha soce pihicchāyaṃ siniha-saniha pītiyaṃ.
anya-e1214n:366: 117. Su savaṇe saka sattimhi khī khayamhi gi saddane,
anya-e1214n:367: Apa-sambhū (ca) pāpuṇane hi gatimhi vū saṃvare;
anya-e1214n:370: Kī vinimaye ci caye ji jaye ñā’vabodhane,
anya-e1214n:373: Pī tappaṇe mā pamāṇe khipakkhepe mi hiṃsane,
anya-e1214n:374: Mi pamāṇe mu bandhe (ca) lu pacchede si bandhane
anya-e1214n:378: Tanu vitthāre saka sattismiṃ-du paritāpe sanu dānasmiṃ,
anya-e1214n:379: Vana yācāyaṃ manu bodhasmiṃ-hi gate apa pāpuṇanasmiṃ (hi,)
anya-e1214n:383: Cura theyye loka (dhātu) dassane aki lakkhaṇe,
anya-e1214n:392: Vacca ajjhāyane acca pūjāyaṃ vaca bhāsane,
anya-e1214n:393: Raca patiyatane suca pesuññe ruca rocane;
anya-e1214n:396: Sajjā’jja ajjane tajja tajjane vajja vajjane;
anya-e1214n:398: Yuja saṃyamane pūja pūjāyaṃ tija tejane,
anya-e1214n:399: Paja magga saṃvaraṇe gate bhaja vibhājane;
anya-e1214n:405: Naṭa nacce caṭa-puṭa bhede vaṇṭa vibhājane;
anya-e1214n:408: Guṇṭha oguṇṭhane heṭha bādhāyaṃ veṭha veṭhane
anya-e1214n:409: Guḍi veṭhe kaḍi-khaḍi bhedane maḍi bhūsane;
anya-e1214n:412: Taḍi saṃtāḷane piṇḍa saṅghāte chaḍḍa chaḍḍane;
anya-e1214n:414: Vaṇṇa saṃvaṇṇane cuṇṇa cuṇṇane āṇa pesane,
anya-e1214n:415: Gaṇa saṃkalane kaṇṇa savaṇe cinta cintane;
anya-e1214n:417: Santa saṅkocane manta gutta bhāsana jānane,
anya-e1214n:420: Yata nīyyātane gantha sandabbhe attha yācane,
anya-e1214n:421: Katha vākyappabandhe (ca) vida ñāṇe nude cuda;
anya-e1214n:426: Hiḷāda (tu) sukhe gandha sūcane vidha kampane,
anya-e1214n:427: Randha pāke (atho) māna pūjāyaṃ nu tthutimhi (tu;)
anya-e1214n:429: Thana devasadde ūna parihāne thena coriye,
anya-e1214n:430: Dhana sadde ñapa tosa nisāna māraṇā’disu;
anya-e1214n:432: Lapa vākye jhapa dāhe rupa ropaṇaādisu,
anya-e1214n:433: Pī tappane (siyā) kappa vitakke labhi vañcane;
anya-e1214n:451: Rusa pārusiye khuṃsa akkose pusa posane;
anya-e1214n:456: Si bandhe missa sammisse kuha vimbhāpane siyā,
anya-e1214n:459: Pihi’cchāyaṃ siyā vīḷa lajjāyaṃ eḷa phāḷane
anya-e1214n:460: Hīḷa gārahiye pīḷa bādhāyaṃ taḷa tāḷane
anya-e1214n:464: Bhuvādī ca rudhādī ca-divādi svā’dayo gaṇā,
